ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Patches
ModMetaData.author: ThatHitmann
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a number of tiny vanilla patches and fixes:

 Wasters don't get as angry about pollution dumping
 Drapes muffle sounds (they finally have a real use)
 Jealous pawns get upset if they share a lover
 Immortal pawns don't demand age reversal
 Clothing has no gender restriction
 Prisoners can be transferred to another bed
 Similar genes are considered the same xenotype, even if they aren't a perfect match
 Caravans with nocturnal pawns rest at night instead
 Fully covered pawns don't have sunlight sensitivity. Pawns wearing spacer-tier armor don't have the soaking wet moodlet
 Highlight steam geysers while placing things that require a geyser like geothermal generators
 Pawns with both misandrist and misogynist instead get the "misanthropist" trait


As well as a few debug actions:


Progress all "tend percent diseases" on a pawn (like gut worms which needs total tend quality to exceed 300%)
 Half a pawn (remove one of each mirrored organ, and 50% of the brain. This was used for a challenge run I posted on my Youtube channel)
 Quarter a pawn (the same, but do 50% damage to each remaining organ)


And more to come...
